title: UK survey : when most consumers will start their Christmas shopping in the UK in 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
The highest Month November has 29.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Month The week before Christmas.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of respondents in each Month on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
The highest Month November has 29.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Month The week before Christmas.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of respondents in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 31.0 is found at Month November and the minimum is found at The week before Christmas where Month is 2.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Month Alredy bought presents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Month is 29.0.
Share of respondents at Month November is 31.0 , second place is Alredy bought presents at 25.0, and thirdly is December at 17.0.
Over the past 6 Months, the Share of respondents has declined.
Month October, and December have a similar Share of respondents that is 17.0.
The Month The week before Christmas tends to be 1.86 percent lower than average.
